WEATHER FORECAST FOR 13 NOVEMBER 2023
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 13 November 2023
The low-level atmospheric disturbance over the island still persists.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at times over most parts of the island.
Heavy showers above 100 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central,
Southern, Northern, North-Western, North-central and Eastern provinces.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
